channel.title: These people are the worst
channel.description:
The guys that watch other people choose names and then make a name that is a slight variation of somebody else's.
I'm cool with themes.
But not slightly changing somebody's name and making it theirs. I don't know why that bothers me but it does haha
That is why I wait till 3 seconds left to hit enter

item.title: These people are the worst
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
I only do it when I’m playing with a Friend and cannot think of a name to disguise myself as so he doesn’t know it’s me.

Read full topic

item.title: These people are the worst
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
I had someone name themselves my username. I was king and checked them night one. Were cult. They rage quit after they were lynched. Get fucked

Read full topic
